tables.title: Financial Summary
rows: Profit for the financial year from continuing operations
Profit for the financial year from discontinued operations, net of tax

markdown:
|                                | Group RM'000 | Company RM'000 |
|--------------------------------|--------------|----------------|
| Profit before tax              | 897,799      | 501,330        |
| Income tax expense             | (156,385)    | (30,838)       |
| Profit for the financial year from continuing operations | 741,414      | 470,492        |
| Profit for the financial year from discontinued operations, net of tax | 94,632       | 106,514        |
| Profit for the financial year  | 836,046      | 577,006        |
| Profit attributable to:        |              |                |
| Owners of the Company          | 806,225      | 577,006        |
| Non-controlling interests      | 29,821       | -              |
| Total                          | 836,046      | 577,006        |
summary: The table provides a financial summary comparing Group and Company figures in RM'000. It includes details on profit before tax, income tax expense, and profit distribution between owners and non-controlling interests.
